title: A Beckoning From Paradise
description: Dr. Robert E McGinnis has been writing books for over thirty years. All of his books are intended to offer motivation and entertainment to the reader. This latest group of books, called the Paradise Series are each totally fictional with a hint of reality. There are five books in this series and A Beckoning From Paradise is the first. Dr. McGinnis graduated from Southern Illinois University with a BS in education and his Doctorate from Nova Southern University. He spent almost thirty years teaching school and retired from that noble occupation to complete these books which were conceived years back.The books in this series A Beckoning From Paradise2. Secrets Of Paradise3. Paradise Is Where you Find It4. Paradise Grows5. Raised In ParadiseOther books Search of Paradise 1999In Search of Paradise 2000 revisedIn Search of Paradise 2007 expandedSunday Letters 2007
author: Robert E.  McGinnis
